title: Viatto Music Player
summary: Viatto Music Player is the best music player for Android devices!
description: Viatto Music Player is an intuitive, feature-rich music player with beautiful design. Features: - Beautiful design inspired by Tumblr- Built-in 5-band equalizer with custom presets- ID3 tag editor- Automatically downloads all information about artist, album and song from Last.fm and web- Fetches lyrics both from web and file tags- Gapeless playback- Folder browsing- Full-scale application for Adnroid Wear with songs/albums/artists lists- Themes and various customizations in upcoming updates! More information at http://viatto.me
descriptionHTML:
Viatto Music Player is an intuitive, feature-rich music player with beautiful design.

Features:

- Beautiful design inspired by Tumblr
- Built-in 5-band equalizer with custom presets
- ID3 tag editor
- Automatically downloads all information about artist, album and song from Last.fm and web
- Fetches lyrics both from web and file tags
- Gapeless playback
- Folder browsing
- Full-scale application for Adnroid Wear with songs/albums/artists lists
- Themes and various customizations in upcoming updates!

More information at http://viatto.me
comments: Crash and no refund Worked fine, but after I opened it on my LG G Watch the app crashed and now it doesn't work anymore. No option to refund my money
